The actual recorded channel depends on the captured audio:
If mono is captured and recordingChannel is 2, the recorded audio is duplicated mono, not true stereo.
If stereo is captured and recordingChannel is 1, the recorded audio is mixed down to mono. The integration solution also affects the final recorded channels. Contact technical support if stereo recording is required.

plentry.pd: The absolute path of the recording file (including file extension). For example: . Ensure the log file directory exists and is writable.

Recording sample rate (Hz). Supports the following values: 16000, (default) 32000, 44100, 48000. If you set this parameter to 44100 or 48000, Agora recommends recording a WAV file, or an AAC file with quality set to AUDIO_RECORDING_QUALITY_MEDIUM or AUDIO_RECORDING_QUALITY_HIGH for better recording quality.

Whether to encode the audio data:
: Encode the audio data in AAC format.
: (Default) Do not encode, save the raw recording data directly.

Recording content options:
AUDIO_FILE_RECORDING_MIC (1): Record only the local user's audio.
AUDIO_FILE_RECORDING_PLAYBACK (2): Record only the audio of all remote users.
AUDIO_FILE_RECORDING_MIXED (3): (Default) Record mixed audio of the local and all remote users.

pd.note: This parameter applies to AAC files only.

ul.li: AUDIO_RECORDING_QUALITY_LOW (0): Low quality. For example, with a sample rate of 32000 Hz, a 10-minute AAC file is about 1.2 MB.
AUDIO_RECORDING_QUALITY_MEDIUM (1): (Default) Medium quality, file size is about 2 MB.
AUDIO_RECORDING_QUALITY_HIGH (2): High quality, file size is about 3.75 MB.
AUDIO_RECORDING_QUALITY_ULTRA_HIGH (3): Ultra-high quality, sample rate is 32 kHz, file size is about 7.5 MB after 10 minutes of recording.

pd.note:
The actual recorded audio channel depends on the captured audio channel.
If the captured audio is mono and recordingChannel is set to 2, the recorded data will be stereo duplicated from mono, not true stereo.
If the captured audio is stereo and recordingChannel is set to 1, the recorded data will be mono mixed from stereo. The integration scheme also affects the final recorded audio channel. Contact technical support if you need stereo recording.
